text:
`plotting.plot_img('4Dimage.nii')`
Error message : 
Input data has incompatible dimensionality: Expected dimension is 3D and you provided a 4D image. See http://nilearn.github.io/manipulating_images/input_output.html.

There is a point at the end of the URL which could be remove to allow to user to directly click on it (in ipython)
title: syntax error in URL link - error message of plotting.plot_img
syntax error in URL link - error message of plotting.plot_img
